name: Cyber Dude: Dev Tycoon
description:
Ever wanted to become a genius, billionaire, playboy but doubt your strength? It's time for action! Become a computer genius and get ready to conquer Mars, because you are the one who can do it!

Gather your riches, buy new homes around the world, upgrade computers and become more genius by improving your skills. Create Apps and Games. Get legendary items. Fight viruses. Start your adventure now and find yourself on another planet!

Game Features:

Travel the world, upgrade your computer to the super holographic. Open a space station and become a resident of Mars.

Learn all the skills and build your own amazing company.

Change your appearance. New clothes, new hairstyles. Choose your style.

Collect a unique collection of items.

A mountain house, a bungalow on a sunny beach or an urban studio in a metropolis will be yours. Or maybe you will reach unprecedented heights. Find yourself on a red planet, becoming the brightest mind in the universe. It is up to you to decide.

Follow us to get news and updates on Cyber Dude.
